main event: A prospector in the Cascade Mountains reported seeing five red disk-shaped objects banking in the sun on June 24, 1947.
interesting points: The objects were white with fluctuating reddish bottoms and emitted no sound,The sighting lasted for 1.5-2 seconds,The objects flew from north to south at high speed,The observer used a telescope to view the objects,The unusual behavior of the compass during the observation was noted as potentially significant.
witness description: A prospector working in the Cascade Mountains
